content.text: what do you do for fun?
I like to lift weights and enjoy simpler things in life.
I listen to audiobooks and podcasts.  I recently bought a bike so I can enjoy the woods on my own terms.
thats really cool! I love to lamp to relax.
I like to read, what are you reading now?
I recently left McDonalds to pursue my passion for dancing.
Wow, that must have been a difficult decision.
It was, but it was the right one.
I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax.
I'm not really a TV person, but I love Italian food.
